// The question seems to be misleading
// Given that N x M squres, and a Queen travels along these squares
// However, from the sample answers travelling on the edges of matrix were expected

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int R, C;
int paths;
void CountMatrixPaths(int i = 0, int j = 0) {
    if( i == R && j == C ) {
        ++paths;
        return;
    }

    if( i > R || j > C )
        return;

    CountMatrixPaths(i+1, j); // right
    CountMatrixPaths(i, j+1); // down
}

int main() {
    int tests;
    cin >> tests;

    for(int i = 0; i < tests; i++) {
        cin >> C;
        cin >> R;
        CountMatrixPaths();
        cout << paths << endl;
        paths = 0;
    }

    return 0;
}
